* How to change transport in SipekSdk (UDP/TCP/TLS)? *
{{{
To set the TCP transport you have to set accounts transport mode. Get your instance of IConfigurationInterface, set the appropriate transport mode and then reregister:
 
'Config.Accounts[accountId].TransportMode = ETransportMode.TM_TCP;'


}}}
